channel.title: Big Deal on Vector Database Group @ NTU

item.title: We‘ve made a big deal with A*Star!
item.description: Congratulations to Yuexuan Xu, Jianyang Gao, and Yutong Gou for publishing the paper “iRangeGraph: Improvising Range-dedicated Graphs for Range-filtering Nearest Neighbor Search” at SIGMOD 2025!
